resources.string: Result: Extremely Obese.\n\nIt is an indication that you are overweight for your height, in other words, that you are fat. Obesity, cardiovascular diseases, diabetes, hypertension etc. is a risk factor for chronic diseases. It is very important for your health that you go to a normal weight by weakening under the control of a physician / dietitian by applying to a health institution. Please contact your healthcare provider.

Result: You are above your ideal weight.\n\nIndicates that you are overweight for your height. Being overweight leads to obesity, which is a risk factor for many diseases, unless necessary precautions are taken.

Result: You are below your ideal weight.\n\nIt shows that you are not in the appropriate weight for your height and that you are weak. Weakness is an undesirable condition that poses a risk for some diseases. In order to reach a weight suitable for your height, you should eat adequate and balanced nutrition and take care to improve your eating habits.

Result: Your weight is completely normal.\n\nIndicates that you are the appropriate weight for your height. Take care to maintain this weight by eating a sufficient and balanced diet and doing regular physical activity.
